q: similar tack on a question that came to haunt the Bush administration: Why didn't the Pentagon dispatch more troops to Iraq at the outset, rather than Donald Rumsfeld 's preferred option of a light and agile force? There was no disagreement among those of us responsible for the planning, Donald Rumsfeld says, adding: "If anyone suggested to Tommy Franks or[ Joint Chiefs of Staff Chairman Dick Cheney ] Richard Myers that the war plan lacked sufficient troops, they never informed me." milestone for Gabrielle Giffords . Shortly before the service, surrounded by her husband Mark Kelson , Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi and her close friends Rep. Debbie Wasserman Schultz ( D-Fla.) and Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-N.Y.), she opened her eyes. She's in her hospital bed. I'm holding her hand, we're talking about how great she is and how inspiring she is. And we're talking about all the fun things we want to do. And she's squeezing my hand and I'm knowing that she's reacting. She's moving her leg and she's moving her arms. And we're getting so excited because we can see that she's really trying so hard to communicate with us.
